This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] <a>: Setting <javascript://x/>.port = '12'
  assert_equals: expected "javascript://x:12/" but got "javascript://x/"
[FAIL] <area>: Setting <javascript://x/>.port = '12'
  assert_equals: expected "javascript://x:12/" but got "javascript://x/"
